verbose_text: The TF GATA3, which is crucial not only for T cell survival and commitment in early stages but also for the transition to the DP state in later stages, was not hypermethylated in ALK- ALCL, and there was no expression difference when compared to CD3 + T cells, corresponding to the DNA methylation phenotype of ALK- ALCL tumors that more closely resemble the DP stage of thymic development.
